file_content.text: You made a good call, boss.
The Republic and Empire's ships were so caught up with each other, they didn't even see us.
This kind of fleet can't last. But I've never seen anything like it.
You've got every name in the underworld calling you the "boss of bosses." I guess it's time to let that blaster shipment slide.
This man is my personal enemy. Take care of him.
Time's up. [Kill him.]
Of course.
Yes, sir.
With pleasure.
They're calling you the "boss of bosses". I've never heard so many people answer to one name. Not Rogun, not Ivory, not Nok Drayen.
The Voidwolf did most of the work... but he's dead, so I'll take the credit!
Aw... it was nothing.
And you? Are you ready to join my empire?
Swear your loyalty.
What, do you want me to tattoo it on my forehead? Yes. I'm in.
Should I go knock some heads at Port Nowhere? Take over where you had Darmas Pollaran brokering?
All of Rogun's men are working for you, Captain. If you want, I can go to Port Nowhere, get things in order....
Kind of take over where Darmas Pollaran left off, you know?
Get back out there and keep pillaging. What good are you?
Why are we all standing here?
My kind of boss....
Here is a small taste of the haul we've taken. Where should we deliver the rest?
I can put Port Nowhere back into shape for you. Take over where Darmas Pollaran fatally scorched it.
Ah, like I said, I'd be happy to take over for Darmas Pollaran. Be your broker at Port Nowhere?
Should I take over at Port Nowhere? I assume Darmas Pollaran went down with the Voidwolf?
Let everyone know Port Nowhere is mine again. All business goes through there.
Take it all to Port Nowhere.
I'm not a banker. I don't care how you pay your tribute, as long as the credits are there when I need them.
Don't bother me with details.
Ivory is the one to report to when I'm not at Port Nowhere.
I want Ivory in charge
I value your trust, Captain. I will be honored to serve as the face of your operations.
Forget Port Nowhere. Just bring everything to my mansion. The servants will let you in.
I'm retiring.
What mansion? Are you talking about this tin-can ship? And what about the "servant" crack?
Yeah, right, retire... you'll jump the first time someone waves another impossible mission in front of you.
Haha.
I hear Moff Tyrak has a place on the Gold Beaches up for sale....
You need your own sail barge? I know a Hutt who's selling cheap....
They're all talking about you out there, Captain. Calling you the Voidhound.
They're all talking about you out there, Captain. Calling you the Bandit King.
They're all talking about you, Captain. Calling you the Republic's Shield.
You know what the captain wants. Let's get on with it.
You know what the captain wants. What are you waiting for?
You all know what the captain wants. Quit stalling.
I'll tell them to report to Port Nowhere.
And us, Captain?
Were you serious about retiring?
Even swimming in a lake of credits would get old pretty fast. Let's find somewhere new.
Nah. I'm made for adventure.
What do we do while you sit around all day counting your credits?
I'm not the armchair type. Let's see what new adventures are out there.
Let's find new horizons.
So I'm the galaxy's biggest crime lord... you think I'm stopping there?
Time to expand my empire.
Aye, aye, Captain.
Full speed ahead.
Yeah!
I've got nowhere else to be.
What if I just buy the mansion and retire for you? I could, you know, keep the place warm for you. No...?
Just tell me where to set course next, Captain.
I'm sure we can find somewhere big enough for all of us. Maybe hollow out an asteroid....
Let's retire together.
Give Risha her own audience chamber....
Corso and Akaavi can share the gun range....
Plant a forest for Bowdaar....
And a big swimming pool for Guss....
Back to the ship! Let's start shopping....
Do we call you "Admiral" now, Captain?
Who else would command such a fleet?
It won't stay together long. It took a lot of threats and a lot of deaths to bring together this many ships with no grudges taking it down.
If you have orders for us, I'd make them soon.
Your fleet is part of the Republic now.
Turn against the Empire.
The Voidwolf just sent us an Imperial warship escort. Shall we start by destroying it?
You sure the Republic will accept our help, Captain? Sometimes they can be a bit squeamish....
I want you to hit every profitable target in this sector, Republic or Empire. Let them both fear me.
Piracy. The galaxy is ours!
That's the kind of order I don't mind taking.
They're busy fighting each other. They'll be easy prey.
Tell every ship in the fleet to send tribute to me, then you're free to go.
I just want the money.
Easy enough.
You missed an opportunity here, Captain. Don't think it will come again.
Captain! I've been monitoring the Voidwolf's internal communications. He's got a fail-safe set to destroy the ship!
Captain! We got a line into the Voidwolf's systems from here. He's got some kind of fail-safe counting down. I think you need to get out of there!
Blast! That was the hangar with your shuttle. I'd start looking for the escape pods.
Otherwise, you're going nose-first back to Corellia.
That was the hangar with your shuttle! Captain, you need to find an escape pod!
The ship's going to crash into Corellia!
